name: @lerna/pack-directory
readme:
# `@lerna/pack-directory`

> Pack a directory into an npm package tarball

This package owes an immense debt of gratitude to [Kat March√°n](https://github.com/zkat), [Rebecca Turner](https://github.com/iarna), and all past contributors to npm for making such awesome software that I basically copied.

## Usage

Maybe don't use it, just yet. Here be dragons.
